synopsis.text: Mira Munakata is a 15-year-old boy who has recently started high school. He secretly has a passionate love affair with his father, famous Hollywood actor Kousuke Munakata. Their relationship becomes complicated when Kousuke considers marrying his celebrity co-star Mitsuki. Meanwhile, Mira's childhood friend Kazuki confesses his romantic feelings. Mira already struggles with inner turmoil over his taboo relationship with his father. Learning that Kousuke is not actually his biological father adds further emotional distress. Mira grapples with preserving the affair he cherishes while numerous romantic prospects surround him. Despite the controversial and complex dynamics, Mira single-mindedly yearns for his father's affection. As various truths come to light, the course of the characters' relationships hangs in the balance.
